trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when trying to access a drive or share that is not available.
trans-unit.target: 無法使用嘗試存取磁碟機或共用時，會擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The DriveNotFoundException class uses the HRESULT COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: DriveNotFoundException 類別會使用 HRESULT COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND。

trans-unit.source: This exception can be thrown when a Win32 ERROR_PATH_NOT_FOUND HRESULT error is encountered.
trans-unit.target: 遇到 Win32 ERROR_PATH_NOT_FOUND HRESULT 錯誤時，可以擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.DriveNotFoundException"></xref> class with its message string set to a system-supplied message and its HRESULT set to COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.DriveNotFoundException"></xref>具有其訊息字串設定為系統提供訊息和其 HRESULT 設定為 COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND 類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Could not find the specified directory."
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的新執行個體，系統提供的訊息，描述錯誤，例如 「 找不到指定的目錄。 」</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This message is localized based on the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此訊息會根據目前系統文化特性進行當地語系化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the new instance is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的新執行個體的屬性會初始化為`null`。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.DriveNotFoundException"></xref> class with the specified message string and the HRESULT set to COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.DriveNotFoundException"></xref>具有指定的訊息字串和 HRESULT 設定為 COR_E_DIRECTORYNOTFOUND 類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the new instance using the `message` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的新執行個體使用`message`參數。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the new instance is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的新執行個體的屬性會初始化為`null`。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> object that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述錯誤的物件。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.DriveNotFoundException"></xref> class with the specified serialization and context information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.DriveNotFoundException"></xref>類別具有指定的序列化和內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that contains the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>物件，其中包含有關擲回例外狀況的序列化的物件資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination of the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>物件，其中包含來源或目的地，所擲回的例外狀況的相關內容資訊。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.DriveNotFoundException"></xref> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IO.DriveNotFoundException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException>.</xref:System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
